citations.narrative:
On May 26, 2022 a swing gate that provided access to a shared lock-out area between the Dall Sheep and Mountain
Goat exhibits was found open and the animals co-mingled in the Sheep enclosure. Lauren, the adult female Dall Sheep,
was found with a laceration behind the right mandible that was assessed to most likely have been caused by a mountain
goat horn. Veterinary treatment was provided to Lauren by the Attending Veterinarian. Lauren was found dead the
morning of May 28, 2022 due to injuries and stress of the incident.
All enclosures must be constructed to contain the animals and to prevent injury or harm to the animals.
Corrected prior to the time of inspection. Immediately after the incident, double padlocks were used on the gate and two
personnel were present when gate was used until the gate was permanently welded shut to prevent reoccurrence.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
On May 26, 2022 a swing gate that provided access to a shared lock-out area between the Dall Sheep and Mountain 
Goat exhibits was found open and the animals co-mingled in the Sheep enclosure. Lauren, the adult female Dall Sheep, 
was found with a laceration behind the right mandible that was assessed to most likely have been caused by a mountain 
goat horn. Veterinary treatment was provided to Lauren by the Attending Veterinarian. Lauren was found dead the 
morning of May 28, 2022 due to injuries and stress of the incident.  
All enclosures must be constructed to contain the animals and to prevent injury or harm to the animals. 
Corrected prior to the time of inspection. Immediately after the incident, double padlocks were used on the gate and two 
personnel were present when gate was used until the gate was permanently welded shut to prevent reoccurrence. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
